title: Man Arrested In Moscow For Satanism, Promoting Same-Sex Relationships
content: Russia on Monday arrested a medic for "Satanism" and "promoting same-sex relationships", as Moscow intensifies a legal crackdown on LGBTQ rights, in defence of what it calls "traditional family values".
summary: Russia on Monday arrested a medic for "Satanism" and "promoting same-sex relationships", as Moscow intensifies a legal crackdown on LGBTQ rights, in defence of what it calls "traditional family values".

title: "Yaarana Chalta Rahega": Foreign Ministry On India-Maldives Relations
content: Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu is in India for a state visit, a significant moment in relations after the diplomatic relations between the states were severely affected when three Maldivian ministers made derogatory remarks against PM Modi.
summary: Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu is in India for a state visit, a significant moment in relations after the diplomatic relations between the states were severely affected when three Maldivian ministers made derogatory remarks against PM Modi.

title: Explained: What Is microRNA, The 2024 Noble-Winning Discovery
content: The Nobel Prize in Medicine was awarded on Monday to two US scientists for discovering microRNA, a previously unknown type of genetic switch which is hoped can pave the way for new medical breakthroughs.
summary: The Nobel Prize in Medicine was awarded on Monday to two US scientists for discovering microRNA, a previously unknown type of genetic switch which is hoped can pave the way for new medical breakthroughs.

title: New York To London In 1 Hour: Hypersonic Jet Set For Test Flight In 2025
content: Developed by startup engineering company Venus Aerospace, this futuristic plane will reach astonishing speeds of up to Mach 6 (3,600mph/5,795km/h).
summary: Developed by startup engineering company Venus Aerospace, this futuristic plane will reach astonishing speeds of up to Mach 6 (3,600mph/5,795km/h).

title: After Helene, Florida Orders Evacuations As Hurricane Milton Strengthens
content: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has declared 51 of the state's 67 counties under a state of emergency, predicting Hurricane Milton could have "major, major impacts".
summary: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has declared 51 of the state's 67 counties under a state of emergency, predicting Hurricane Milton could have "major, major impacts".

title: "Its An Earthquake," Says Gary Ruvkun, 2024 Nobel Prize In Medicine Winner
content: US scientist Gary Ruvkun, who on Monday won the Nobel Prize in Medicine with fellow American Victor Ambros for their discovery of microRNA, said winning the honour was like "an earthquake".
summary: US scientist Gary Ruvkun, who on Monday won the Nobel Prize in Medicine with fellow American Victor Ambros for their discovery of microRNA, said winning the honour was like "an earthquake".

title: On 1st Anniversary Of War, Fate Of 63 Hostages Held In Gaza Unknown
content: For Hamas, the hostages are key bargaining chips in negotiations with Israel aiming to secure a truce and the release of Palestinian prisoners.
summary: For Hamas, the hostages are key bargaining chips in negotiations with Israel aiming to secure a truce and the release of Palestinian prisoners.

title: US Teacher Caught Having Sex With Minor Student At Under-Construction Home
content: The teacher was charged with improper relationship between educator and student, a second-degree felony, and is being held at the Comal County Jail.
summary: The teacher was charged with improper relationship between educator and student, a second-degree felony, and is being held at the Comal County Jail.

title: "God Save The Tsar": Putin Receives Nationalist Wishes On 72nd Birthday
content: "God save the Tsar!" was one of the first public birthday wishes for President Vladimir Putin who turns 72 on Monday and who has been Russia's paramount leader for nearly quarter of a century.
summary: "God save the Tsar!" was one of the first public birthday wishes for President Vladimir Putin who turns 72 on Monday and who has been Russia's paramount leader for nearly quarter of a century.

title: Opinion: Iran And Israel: Restraint Is Not Even On The Table Anymore
content: As things stand, unless sanity prevails on all sides, we are heading irreversibly into an abyss of disaster being facilitated, primarily, by the absence of any effective multilateral deterrence.
summary: As things stand, unless sanity prevails on all sides, we are heading irreversibly into an abyss of disaster being facilitated, primarily, by the absence of any effective multilateral deterrence.

title: 2024 Nobel Prize In Medicine Goes To US Scientists For microRNA Discovery
content: Scientists Victor Ambros and Gary Ruvkun won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for the discovery of microRNA and its role in gene regulation, the award-giving body said on Monday.
summary: Scientists Victor Ambros and Gary Ruvkun won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for the discovery of microRNA and its role in gene regulation, the award-giving body said on Monday.

title: Japan Admits Doctoring Cabinet Photo To Make Ministers Look Less Unkempt
content: Japan's government admitted Monday manipulating an official photo of the new cabinet to make its members look less unkempt, after online mockery of their sagging trousers.
summary: Japan's government admitted Monday manipulating an official photo of the new cabinet to make its members look less unkempt, after online mockery of their sagging trousers.

title: Huge Currency Swap Agreement To Help Maldives On Foreign Exchange Reserves
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday underlined New Delhi's position as a "close friend" of the Maldives and emphasised his government's readiness to respond to medical and economic emergencies as part of its 'neighbourhood first' foreign policy.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday underlined New Delhi's position as a "close friend" of the Maldives and emphasised his government's readiness to respond to medical and economic emergencies as part of its 'neighbourhood first' foreign policy.

title: Kamala Harris Is Unfazed By Any Surprises, Predicts US Poll "Nostradamus"
content: Despite his unwavering forecast for Kamala Harris, Dr Allan Lichtman emphasised the importance of voter participation. "The outcome is up to you, so get out and vote," he urged.
summary: Despite his unwavering forecast for Kamala Harris, Dr Allan Lichtman emphasised the importance of voter participation. "The outcome is up to you, so get out and vote," he urged.

title: "October 7 - The Day We Failed": Israel's Army Chief On War Anniversary
content: Israel is fighting a "long war", the country's military chief told its soldiers and commanders a day ahead of the first anniversary of the 2023 Hamas attack, vowing to wipe out its "enemies" who seek to destroy Israel.
summary: Israel is fighting a "long war", the country's military chief told its soldiers and commanders a day ahead of the first anniversary of the 2023 Hamas attack, vowing to wipe out its "enemies" who seek to destroy Israel.

title: US Man, Wrongly Convicted For 22 Years, Says Prison Saved His Life
content: Convicted in 1995 of a double homicide, Calvin Buari was sentenced to 50 years to life for the deaths of two brothers, Elijah and Salhaddin Harris, in the Bronx.
summary: Convicted in 1995 of a double homicide, Calvin Buari was sentenced to 50 years to life for the deaths of two brothers, Elijah and Salhaddin Harris, in the Bronx.

title: Man Sets His Arm On Fire In US To Protest Against Israel-Hamas War
content: Thousands marched in US cities from Washington to Los Angeles on Saturday, demanding an immediate ceasefire as the war in Gaza nears the one-year mark, with a man attempting to self-immolate in protest.
summary: Thousands marched in US cities from Washington to Los Angeles on Saturday, demanding an immediate ceasefire as the war in Gaza nears the one-year mark, with a man attempting to self-immolate in protest.

title: "So Much Death": Gaza Journalist Explains Mental Toll Of Covering War
content: On the morning of October 7, 2023, Ismail Abu Hatab, a photojournalist, woke up to the deafening roar of rockets being fired from Gaza towards Israel.
summary: On the morning of October 7, 2023, Ismail Abu Hatab, a photojournalist, woke up to the deafening roar of rockets being fired from Gaza towards Israel.

title: Use Of Sarco 'Suicide' Pod Suspended Amid Swiss Criminal Investigation
content: Advocacy groups behind the controversial Sarco' suicide pod have suspended applications for its use, pending a criminal investigation into its first deployment in Switzerland.
summary: Advocacy groups behind the controversial Sarco' suicide pod have suspended applications for its use, pending a criminal investigation into its first deployment in Switzerland.

title: Haunting Image From Gaza Went Viral As Israel Responded To October 7 Attack
content: The photograph of Inas Abu Maamar, face buried in the shrouded body of her dead five-year-old niece Saly, was taken days after Israel began its military offensive on Gaza.
summary: The photograph of Inas Abu Maamar, face buried in the shrouded body of her dead five-year-old niece Saly, was taken days after Israel began its military offensive on Gaza.
